## Selected Research

### AI Exposure and Labor Market Dynamics  
_Working paper_  
This project measures occupational exposure to AI using O*NET, CIP-SOC crosswalks, and develops new causal inference strategies.

### Job Lock and Employer-Sponsored Insurance  
_Work in progress_  
Analyzing the effect of health insurance on job mobility and wage compensation using HRS, SSA, and LEHD data.
